item.title: Seriously publishing a video game, my 2 year journey so far.
item.description: Content Warning: Too many words, distractions, programmer art, brackets, videos, geeky terms, hyperlinks, attempts at humor. Prologue Note: 95-99.9% game projects started never get published. Source: Random Reddit question I found In early 2021, after my previous 2 year long personal project (ANXCamera) and 3 Games (ANXBounce, ANXBattle and ANXDefense). I was getting bored and craving to build something new and share with the world. I tried making some prototypes in Unity Game Engine inspired from Elite Dangerous, like an asymmetrical spaceship doing 6DoF movement

item.description: Intial Post Bleep Bloop Cha Ching
